content.question: Light from a coherent source passes through a pair of narrow slits spaced a distance <math alttext="d" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> apart and produces a diffraction pattern with bright spots that are spaced a distance <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>X</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> apart, as shown in Figure 1.
